title: Oh, mrs eaves.
content:
i'm only a lowly graphic design student, but i already know that people have a love/hate relationship with mrs eaves.   
i personally adore it.   
   
however, it is a baskerville revival, and with the current popularity of mrs eaves, i wonder what are your opinions concerning baskerville, mrs eaves 'father' face?

 [‹ Google Satellite Maps - Huge Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20080615191339/http:/www.typophile.com/node/10199 "Go to previous forum topic") [Resources on handwritten/crafted lettering? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080615191339/http:/www.typophile.com/node/10141 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jaci_core

comments.content: I loved her; _Mrs Eaves that is_; but I think shes been busy and 'slightly' over worked, lately, _sadly enough_.. ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080615191339im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/plain.gif) _( If I were to recommend a Baskerville it may well be ' [John Baskerville](http://web.archive.org/web/20080615191339/http:/www.stormtype.com/jbasker.html)', by Franti_
